availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, assistant marshal for city of Lexington. Virginia native. Married to Louisa Wickliffe. Father of Susanna Wickliffe, Mary Wickliffe, Virginia Wickliffe, James Wickliffe, Charles Wickliffe, Drucilla Wickliffe, and Edwin Wickliffe. Owned one enslaved person in Lexington in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Lexington in 1860. Constable for Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky in 1850. Assistant marshal for Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky in 1860.
